doc:
Bérénice Bejo https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/B%C3%A9r%C3%A9nice_Bejo 0 Bérénice Bejo (French pronunciation: ​[be.ʁe.nis be.ʒo]; born 7 July 1976) is a French-Argentine actress who played Christiana in the 2001 film A Knight's Tale and Peppy Miller in the 2011 film The Artist. Her work in The Artist received a nomination for the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress and won her the César Award for Best Actress. She won Best Actress at the Cannes Film Festival in 2013 and was nominated for a César for her performance in The Past. Bérénice_Bejo ( French_pronunciation : [_be.ʁe.nis_be.ʒo_] ; born_7_July_1976 ) is a_French-Argentine_actress who played Christiana in the_2001_film A_Knight 's_Tale_and_Peppy_Miller in the_2011_film The_Artist . Her_work in The_Artist received a_nomination for the_Academy_Award for Best_Supporting_Actress and won her_the_César_Award for_Best_Actress . She won Best_Actress at the_Cannes_Film_Festival in 2013 and was_nominated for a_César for her_performance in The_Past .
